Name: EMG multimodal
Acknowledgements: This is a simplified example dataset derived from OpenNeuro ds003739 to demonstrate BIDS formatting for multimodal EEG-EMG-Motion data.
HowToAcknowledge: Please cite the original study: Peterson SM & Ferris DP (2018). Differentiation in theta and beta electrocortical activity between visual and physical perturbations to walking and standing balance. eNeuro, 5(4): ENEURO.0207-18.2018.
